data.description:
When you create this symbol, choose a damage type: air, bolt, dark, earth, fire, ice, light, or poison. The creature bearing this symbol suffers 5 extra damage from sources dealing damage of the chosen type.

  • You: @LOSS[2 ip]

  • Target: @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.aI4tsuVswH5gfGab]{Symbol of Weakness: Air}, @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.MRNCMGIcZStGVV9J]{Symbol of Weakness: Bolt}@EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.zFQpa3KcSAmBCWdE]{Symbol of Weakness: Dark}, @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.YpXM5ClzMzIcwCgd]{Symbol of Weakness: Earth}, @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.dAFACJSQzCbcU9We]{Symbol of Weakness: Fire}, @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.BVOW692emrw4yxR0]{Symbol of Weakness: Ice}, @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.aPBdnNy1hA8aRctl]{Symbol of Weakness: Light}, @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.actor-effects.2sXIFIXiWxRHt8CP]{Symbol of Weakness: Poison}

effects.name: Symbol of Weakness
effects.description: When you create this symbol, choose a damage type: air, bolt, dark, earth, fire, ice, light, or poison. The creature bearing this symbol suffers 5 extra damage from sources dealing damage of the chosen type.
